Skill.Name: Splash
Skill.Lore: When attacking, Kraken unleashes a mighty attack that damages nearby enemies.

Skill.Name: Tsunami Charge
Skill.Lore: Kraken charges toward a target location with great strength and speed, damaging and knocking aside enemies in his path.

Skill.Name: Tidal Pull
Skill.Lore: Kraken's presence slows nearby enemies with a continuous tidal pull.

Skill.Name: Whirlpool
Skill.Lore: Kraken forms two connected whirlpools, one at a target location and one around himself. After a short time, the whirlpool near Kraken sucks everyone in and spits them out at the targeted location. Enemies are damaged in the process.
